last_episode_to_air.name: The Solitary King
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Cult of Light and its demons do everything in their power to get Sofía to open the fifth seal. Guillén has a revelation.

name: Feria: The Darkest Light
overview: Two sisters must face a new reality — and supernatural elements — when it's revealed their parents participated in a cult ritual ending in death.

episodes.name: The Red Lake
episodes.overview: A sinister tragedy rocks the small town of Feria and leaves sisters Eva and Sofía stunned and questioning what they know about their parents.

episodes.name: Babylon
episodes.overview: While searching for answers about her mother's whereabouts, Sofía is introduced to a new world. The townspeople of Feria begin to turn on the sisters.

episodes.name: Offering
episodes.overview: The details surrounding Father Ezcaray's murder confound Guillén. Sofía sinks deeper into her new life. Eva's interview takes a supernatural turn.

episodes.name: The Temple
episodes.overview: In 1975 Elena struggles to fight what her father wants her to do ritualistically, with what she sees as her future. The 90s come with fresh challenges.

episodes.name: The God of Fire
episodes.overview: Estrella researches Gnosticism to learn more about the Cult of Light, which leads her to a discovery. Chisco expresses his concerns about Sofía to Eva.

episodes.name: Bloody Feria
episodes.overview: The sisters are sent a covert message, resulting in a clandestine meeting. Sofía makes a choice between the cult and Eva.

episodes.name: The Apocalypse According to Pablo
episodes.overview: Guillén is consistently frustrated as he interviews members of the cult in his search for answers. Pablo speaks candidly with his daughters.

episodes.name: The Solitary King
episodes.overview: The Cult of Light and its demons do everything in their power to get Sofía to open the fifth seal. Guillén has a revelation.
